    • Method Detail

      • getBrowser

        public static String getBrowser(String userAgent)
        Return what type of browser is used based on the user-agent
        Parameters:
        userAgent - the value of the User-Agent header
        Returns:
        a String with one of the following values depending on the browser:
        • Firefox - firefox
        • Internet Explorer - internet explorer
        • Chrome - chrome
        • Safari - safari
        Or, if not a known browser the error string -1.

      • getBrowserVersion

        public static String getBrowserVersion(String userAgent)
        Return the version of the browser used based on the user-agent
        Parameters:
        userAgent - the value of the User-Agent header
        Returns:
        a String with the browser version, or if not a known browser the error string -1.
